{{disambig-more|Mithrim|[[Mithrim (disambiguation)]]}}
[[Image:J.R.R. Tolkien - Lake Mithrim.jpg|thumb|350px|[[J.R.R. Tolkien]] - ''Lake Mithrim'']]
'''Lake Mithrim''' was a body of water in the land of [[Mithrim]] with its long axis stretching from east to west.<ref>{{S|Map}}</ref>  When the [[Noldor]] first returned to [[Middle-earth]] the [[Sons of Fëanor]] encamped upon the northern shore until [[Fingolfin]]'s host arrived; then the Sons of Fëanor removed to the southern shore to avoid conflict.<ref>{{S|Return}}</ref>

== Other versions of the legendarium==
In ''[[The Book of Lost Tales]]'', this body of water is known as '''Lake Asgon'''.<ref>{{LT1|X}}</ref>
